nodes.bodyText: I can do it and thought about it (because it would be cleaner), but it has a little side effect: If there is an exception in the middle of the method fillMDC now the set MDCs are correctly reseted. If I return the keys, then not.
Very valid point, we could separate prepare and populate (prepareMDC/populateMDC) steps but it looks like too much at this moment. LGTM, thank you!
